about_the_game:
LEVITY Race is the first full-body hoverboard VR racing game, developed for Meta Quest 2+3. Challenge other players or your friends in the fastest hoverboard VR game.

Taking place in the year 2150 after humanity discovered the power of Levitite which has brought hoverboard racing to new heights. Several factions are in control of different parts of Earth.

  • Featuring high-speed racing on multiple tracks in different styles

  • LEVY, your Smartdrone companion will be your support on the tracks

  • A variety of weapons that Levy will use for you (send it to the enemy to attack)

  • Lots of accessibility and comfort options (e.g. standing and seated gaming)

  • Soundtrack created for the game (No AI or license-free music! Streaming allowed)

Hang out in your private garage, alone, or with your friends. Some of its features include:

  • Choose different (unlockable) hoverboard deck designs and skins

  • Customise your Avatar or tune your hoverboard controls

  • Talk to LEVY to learn more about the History of Levity and Levitite

  • Some other surprises for you

Get on the right track with LEVITY Race and feel the Adrenaline!

Wishlist the game to stay up to date with the newest developments.

Launching into early access 2025

short_description: LEVITY Race is a hoverboard VR racing game with weapons! Play and fight against your friends or other players. Several tracks in different styles depending on the controlling faction of that sector, and different weapons that your drone will be able to use for you.
